posts.description:
We are looking for a young, enthusiastic, energetic PHP developer to join our Nilecode's family and work in one of the best friendly, flexible, professional environments.

Desired Skills & Experience:

- 1 to 2 years PHP Development Experience.
- Bachelor's or Master’s Degree in Computer Science or related field.
- Familiarity with source controls like (SVN, and preferably GIT), and Development Vs. Production environments.
- Object Oriented Programming.
- Good knowledge of WordPress.
- Agile Development Environment Experience.
- Energy, Enthusiasm and Desire.
- Hard Work Mentality and Fast Learning.
   
If this is you then respond ASAP to find out more; Send your updated CV to <jobs@nilecode.com> with a code "PHP-004" in the subject.

posts.caption: redis.io
posts.description: Redis is an open source, BSD licensed, advanced key-value store. It is often referred to as a data structure server since keys can contain strings, hashes, lists, sets and sorted sets.
